tactics.name: exact
tactics.description: Provide a proof term directly. If the term has exactly the type you need to prove, you're done!

tactics.name: intro
tactics.description: Introduce a function argument or assumption. This gives you a variable to work with in your proof.

tactics.name: split
tactics.description: Break a product goal (A * B) into two subgoals: one for A and one for B.

tactics.name: apply
tactics.description: Apply a lemma or hypothesis to the current goal.

tactics.name: reflexivity
tactics.description: Prove equality by computation. Works when both sides are definitionally equal.
